name: Frogo Restaurant
description:
You are the owner of a restaurant, and you have to feed your customers, and avoid thieves.  You can also achieve powerups, by feeding pink frogs. Check out the "how to play" section, of the game, through the menu.

Achieve the highest score you can. 

Review:

This game is full of fun and frogs. Combined with music that the creator doesn't have rights to. Definitely one of the best games that you will ever play. 

Review by Magnus Lund.
